remarks: Property of a functional with a closed kernel.  TODO:  Make ~ lcfl5 etc. obsolete and rewrite w/out ` C ` hypothesis?  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcfl5a.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfl5a.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl5a.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl5a.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl5a.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfl5a.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfl5a.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfl5a.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfl5a $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) = ( L ` G ) <-> ( L ` G ) e. ran I ) ) $.
